title: How to write the best biography of my own - Quora

response.answer_text: To write a biography you need to recollect your memories from childhood till today. This can be done by asking various question to yourself, for example when was the first time you felt proud of yourself, how did you family support you during the challenges of your life, so and so forth. After collecting all the answers of such question you can arrange them according to right timeline and you will have the first draft of your biography.
